doc.title: Al Feldstein - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
doc.snippet: Al Feldstein was born on October 24, 1925 in Brooklyn, New York, and grew up in Flatbush on East 31st Street between Avenue L and Avenue M. He attended P.S. 191, and when he was eight years old, he won a third-place medal in the annual John Wanamaker art competition. ...

doc.title: Comic creator: Al Feldstein
doc.snippet: Al Feldstein was a groundbreaking comic book editor and artist, and one of the mainstays of EC Comics. Born in Brooklyn, New York as the son of a Russian immigrant father and American mother, Feldstein was encouraged by his mother to pursue his artistic ambitions. ...
